text: Eh bino bandimi! Bopusana na losambo te tango bozali na molangwa, kino bokososola maye bozali koloba, mpe tango bozali na mbindo kino bokosukola, longola sé oyo azali na nzela ya mobembo, kasi soki bozali na bokono to mpe bozali na mobembo to mpe moko kati na bino awuti na nzongo ya monene to nzongo ya moke, to mpe bosangani na basi, mpe bozui mayi te mpo ya kopetola nzoto, bosimba mabele ya mpeto mpe bopangusa yango na bilongi na bino, mpe maboko ma bino. Yasôló, Allah azali molimbisi atonda ngolu
